title: Brandied Pecan Pie
ingredients: ['2 eggs, beaten', '125ml single cream', '150g caster sugar', '2 teaspoons plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon treacle', '350g golden syrup', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 1/2 tablespoons brandy', '120g coarsely chopped pecans', '1 (23cm) unbaked pastry case']
